catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 215
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: scenes in and around Kyoto showing foreign visitors, some with "Christian" symbols; some of the figures in "western" dress are probably Japanese; other ambiguously clad figures in foreground may be Koreans; famous sites identified by labels; ornate clouds of embossed gold-leaf decorate all panels and are integral visual element of landscape
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
title: Scenes in and around Kyoto
